title: Erm...2 hours in what world? XD <3 PBE
body: Riot<3 my dear and loved Riot<3 Your PBE maintenance was said to be approx 2 hours...in what world? XDDDDD Its been a lot more, like 4 to 5 hours q.q Can we know when its gonna be over? (Btw I heard there was a PBE board???? Where o3o)

replies.body: We don't have any information on maintenance or downtime on the PBE, but you may find it through the[ PBE boards](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/).  That link should take you to the right place.  Make sure to check the ticker (exclamation on the top right) for current issues.   I hope that helps!
